item.title: Building a Modern Application on AWS EKS with Pulumi: A Practical Journey
item.description: A deep dive into deploying a modern application on AWS EKS using Pulumi in Go, including VPC setup, EKS cluster configuration, VPC endpoints, and troubleshooting common issues.
